be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti
Class Item

java.lang.Object
  be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti.Item

public class Item
extends java.lang.Object

An instance of this class holds the values of the attributes of an element of the learning/testing set.

Constructor Summary

          Builds a new item.

          Returns this item's number of attributes.

Constructor Detail

Item

public Item(AttributeValue[] values)
Builds a new item.

Parameters:
values - An (non empty) array of attribute values. This array is copied.

Returns the values of this item as an array.

nbAttributes

public int nbAttributes()
Returns this item's number of attributes.

Returns:
A strictly positive number of attributes.
